text: John Meehan SJ is a Canadian Jesuit priest and academic administrator. He is president and vice-chancellor of the University of Sudbury in Sudbury, Ontario, Canada. He was formerly rector of the Gesù Church in Montreal and president of Campion College in Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960s births Category:Canadian Jesuits Category:Canadian university and college chief executives Category:McGill University alumni Category:University of Toronto alumni Category:Living people
title: John Meehan (priest)
